body.raw:
Gaith is the driving force behind the Sophia compiler’s development and maintenance since the summer
of 2021. His notable contribution includes introducing the Sophia debugger as part of the Sophia
REPL. Gaith is passionate about documenting and rigorously testing open-source software, emphasizing
high-quality, and easily understandable code.
body.html: Gaith is the driving force behind the Sophia compiler’s development and maintenance since the summer of 2021. His notable contribution includes introducing the Sophia debugger as part of the Sophia REPL. Gaith is passionate about documenting and rigorously testing open-source software, emphasizing high-quality, and easily understandable code.
